verses.plain: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.

tokens.t: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.

verses.plain: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

tokens.t: Behold, as the eyes of servants
unto the hand of their masters,
as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes
our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

verses.plain: Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.

tokens.t: , have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.

verses.plain: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.

tokens.t: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease,
with the contempt of the proud.
